title: Reading A33 fatal collision: Latest - BBC News
summary: fatal collision on the a33 in reading .
police have been investigating since 05:15 bst .
the a33 is now open in both directions .

documents.title: reading returns to normal
text: reading 's traffic has returned to normal after this morning 's fatal crash so we are ending our live coverage now .
for the latest traffic news tune in to bbc radio berkshire or follow @ twitterid on twitter .

documents.title: traffic returning to normal
text: greenwaves services slowly getting back to normal as a33 one lane reopen

documents.title: police confirm a man died in a33 incident
text: thames valley police officers were called at 5.14am today following reports of a collision involving two vehicles on the a33 in reading .
the ambulance service also attended the scene where a man had sadly died .
the a33 was closed in both directions but has since reopened .
a man has been arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving and is in police custody .
further details will be released later today .

documents.title: a33 open in both directions
text: police have opened the a33 in both directions following a fatal collision earlier this morning .
one lane remains closed out of town as recovery takes place of the damaged vehicle .

documents.title: a33 open in to reading
text: travel : a33 northbound now fully open - diversion in place southbound via the slip road by the audi garage .

documents.title: clear-up under way
text: our reporter on the scene tells us the fire service is now clearing the closed section of the road , following the fatal collision earlier .
the a33 is now back open in both directions past the matalan junction with a small diversion via the audi garage while the clear-up takes place .

documents.title: reading fatal collision : latest traffic news
text: reading fatal collision : latest traffic news
author: Matt Vaughan
BBC Berkshire travel presenter

documents.title: traffic at its worst towards m4
text: berkshire 's reporters have been sending us images from across the town .
traffic in the town centre has eased in places , but there are still major delays towards all m4 junctions , despite the a33 now being re-opened .

documents.title: tilehurst looking good
text: tilehurst is actually okay right now .
the main problems are any of those main routes that go to and from the m4 motorway , towards junction 10 , 11 or 12 are struggling big time .
if you come along the oxford road or passing rivermead , those routes are performing well this morning .

documents.title: heavy congestion in reading
text: due to an incident earlier today on the a33 traffic conditions at this time in and around reading are currently heavily congested
any news on when the roads are likely to re-open ?
have heard 4pm not sure though
yikes !
note the a4074 is also closed just outside reading heading to wallingford oxford , accident 3 cars and van .

documents.title: some roads re-open
text: the police are now letting drivers go through the slip road by the audi garage on the a33 to allow traffic to travel south out of town .
and northbound police have now opened one lane past the incident near the matalan junction .
author: Matt Vaughan
BBC Berkshire travel presenter

documents.title: major delays
text: `` major delays in reading this morning , reading traffic looks like it 's in a big loop . ''
author: Matt Vaughan
BBC Berkshire travel presenter

documents.title: all buses delayed in reading
text: due to the closure of the a33 all our services are experiencing significant delays .
town centre is now gridlocked .
is the greenwave 53 to green park still running ?

documents.title: closed for at least two hours
text: the police have just told us that they expect the a33 to remain closed for at least two hours as they deal with investigations following a fatal accident this morning .

documents.title: 'no go area '
text: the closure and traffic problems are likely to remain through the morning according to simon beasley who runs the traffic systems in reading for the borough council .
he tells us there has been damage to traffic signals on the site and his engineers are there making repairs already .
if you are trying to get into reading it is awful , it is a complete no go area .

documents.title: fatal accident
text: the a33 in reading is closed from rose kiln lane towards the castle hill roundabout due to a fatal accident in the early hours of the morning .
we 'll be keeping you up to date with all the latest as it happens .
central reading - a33 junc with rose kiln lane closed due to a fatal collision .
rd to remain closed for next few hours .
pls avoid the area .
poor person and a family now heartbroken somewhere
yep that 's definitely congested plus 4074 closed too due to accident .
